home-page.description: Select an academic term to proceed

shopping-cart-page.empty-cart: Shopping Cart is empty, try adding some courses to proceed with enrolling

class-search.title: Course Search
class-search.description: Search courses based on different criteria

requirements-search.title: My Requirements Search
requirements-search.description: Search courses based on your program requirements

confirm-courses-page.title: Confirm Courses
confirm-courses-page.description: Select Confirm to process your request for the courses listed below and add it to your schedule. To exit without adding these classes, select Cancel. Select the Trash icon to remove a course from the list (it will still be saved in your Shopping Cart for later)

courses-result-page.title: Courses Result
courses-result-page.info: Select one of the courses based on the criteria you entered, you can also modify the search query, or return to the shopping cart
courses-result-page.empty-courses: The search returned no results, you can modify the search query, or return to the shopping cart

enrollment-results-page.title: Enrollment Results
enrollment-results-page.info: View the following status report for enrollment confirmations and errors.
enrollment-results-page.success-message: You have successfully enrolled in this course. The course is now added to your Schedule
